channel.title: SnoSaven Gaming Company - Upcoming RSC Server!
channel.description:
[size=14pt][b]SnoSaven Gaming Company[/b][/size] [size=12pt][i]An RSC Gaming Experience[/i][/size]
[size=10pt]SnoSaven Gaming Company is officially announcing the development and production of an entirely new and original gaming server. Development is now underway and will continue over the next 3 to 5 months. The anticipated release date is January 1, 2012.
This totally unique server features some drastic changes from RSC and many original ideas such as:
[b]Landscape:[/b] The landscape on this game will be, as estimated, 26 times the size of the current RSC world. This entire landscape will be 100% customized and 100% different from any RSC source code. Towns, roads, rivers, etc. will all be entirely new. We're currently still coming up with ideas on how to make it easier for players to travel around this huge landscape.
[b]NPCs:[/b] This game will feature 100% new NPCs and monsters. There will be at least 3 times the amount of NPCs here as there are in any other RSC server, each with unique attributes, capabilities, and immunities. Levels of the attackable NPCs range from level-1 to level-1330 and all have a completely custom look.
[b]Skils:[/b] There will be 38 skills featured in this game. There will be the usual skills (Strength, Defense, Attack, Health, Ranged, Magic, Prayer, Woodcutting, Firemaking, Mining, Smithing, Smelting, etc.) as well as new skills (Adventuring, Necromancy, Building, Trapper, Runemaking, Thievery, etc.) The maximum skill level is 99.
[b]Quests:[/b] Currently, we have 68 quests written and have plans for at least 100 more within the first year of the server's life.
[b]Items:[/b] Every single item on this server will be completely customized. There will, however, be certain items that are the same (which need to be, i.e. buckets, pots, iron armor, weapon types, armor types, shears, jugs, etc.) Currently we have 6 types of armor and weapons which will require different attack, defense, strength, magic, and prayer levels to wield and use. More are in the works. Herbs will be customized, all items will have new looks, new functions, etc.
[b]Graphics:[/b] On this server you can expect the same graphics and feel as original RSC. No changes will be made to the graphics.
[b]F2P/P2P:[/b] Eventually, we will be opening up a subscription system for those who want access to more quests, skills, monsters, items, etc.
[b]Miscellaneous:[/b] Client Window: The client window will be full screen with a section dedicated to your toolbar (inventory, spells, prayers, chat, clan chat, global chat, private chat, quests, tools and settings, etc.) This section will be on the bottom of the screen. On the right hand side will be your map and a section that will be dedicated to a toolbar item of your choice. The left hand side features 2 sections for toolbar items of your choice. Here, you can customize which windows will be constantly open for your convenience.
Clan Chat: Clan chat will be initiated eventually.
XP Rate: The XP Rate is totally customizable. From x1 to x99 for non-subscribers and x1-x120 for subscribers. This allows for ultimate customization of skill levels and leveling speed.
Website: The website (will be open by November 1,) will feature forums, a blog, website chat with friends, highscores, webclient, clan pages, staff pages, event pages, photo albums, customizable profiles, links to sites and resources, etc.
[b]Get ready for a whole new RSC experience![/b] This is by far my greatest undertaking and I really hope this server will take off one day. I have always wished for the RSC world to be bigger and more in-depth and now I can finally say that it will that way soon. Keep checking back here for updates as I will be posting them daily. Thanks for reading this, and happy Runescapin'!
- Kent/Snosaven24 Founder/Administrator - SnoSaven Gaming Company
[/size]
[b]UPDATE LOG:[/b] Monday, August 22, 2011: Posted the official announcement on Moparscape, developing the forums, working on tweaking the source code, dedicating desktop computer to temporary server for testing of the game server.
Tuesday, August 22, 20011: Fiddling around with OpenGL to get myself reacquainted with it, designing log-in screen, developing forums and website, exploring different ways to enhance graphics.

item.description:
@gawdz666 wrote:

[quote=“CodeForFame, post:130, topic:411633”][quote author=RSCShadow link=topic=512888.msg4322348#msg4322348 date=1372370083]

[quote author=CodeForFame link=topic=512888.msg4322347#msg4322347 date=1372369969]

[quote author=RSCShadow link=topic=512888.msg4322344#msg4322344 date=1372369737]

[quote author=CodeForFame link=topic=512888.msg4322338#msg4322338 date=1372368903]

[quote author=gawdz666 link=topic=512888.msg4322262#msg4322262 date=1372364097]

I explained my long absence already. What happened in my life was far bigger than a little game. In fact, I was treating my life like a little game. Regardless, this project is active again and I am working on it whenever I have the time to between work and personal things.
[/quote]Nigga stop doing loveing dope and coding a game that is 12 years old… I have long moved on and just lurk these forums and i remember this thread 2 years ago… Well have a nice life bud!

WTF are these censoring loveing is not mother ucking fcklovelovelove
[/quote]What the fuck are you trying to say?
[/quote]He’s telling him to stop doing drugs and programming RSC. He also mentions that he’s moved on from RSC and occasionally browses the forums, also noting that he remembers this thread from two years ago.
[/quote]Did you see that?
[/quote]I’m going to report you for circumventing the censor.

Go for it… It’s not an enforced rule for “love”. The mods can just look at the warning log, and see that Tom ‘undid’ a warning that was given to someone for it already.[/quote]

Lel love i love you

Read full topic

item.title: SnoSaven Gaming Company - Upcoming RSC Server!
item.dc:creator: @zerratar zerratar
item.description:
@zerratar wrote:

Tomorroww:

You’ve been working on this since 2011 and still haven’t made any visible progress?

I’ve heard that he’s gotten so far that he can now print “Hello World!” in the console! I mean, that’s huge progress already.

Joke aside, I’ve not followed this project so I shouldn’t really answer but from my guesses, it got stuck in the planning phase, discussion about the world size and more. in these 2 years you’d expect that this phase would be long done. However: lack of developers or lack of determination seem to be the cause.

Read full topic

item.title: SnoSaven Gaming Company - Upcoming RSC Server!
item.dc:creator: @Snosaven24 Snosaven24
item.description:
@Snosaven24 wrote:

[quote=“Dustin Jr, post:117, topic:411633”][quote author=JUMPHIM link=topic=512888.msg4317980#msg4317980 date=1371793405]

The RSC map is already small, it’s just a pain to navigate because the only real quick transportation is teleporting, and even then you have to walk. Quests would open up different teleports, portals, and modes of transportation like boats, carriages, etc. It’s only big if you have to walk it.

I hope this is a joke lmao… The rsc is huge compared to the player base that plays. You do realize the Rsc servers had like 1k+ on them when it was open and even then it wasn’t crowded.

if your talking real rsc then your wrong. that shit was always crowded, I use to have to switch worlds to find good training/runes spots.
[/quote]

I’m talking real runescape, you didn’t have to change, but you thought you needed to, it was never crowded enough to not be able to train. I mean yeah instead of 50k an hour you only got 35-40, but that is hardly to crowded. That is like saying i only get 75 men instead of a 100 because there is another guy here.

There is no way this development will bring any more people in. You won’t reach any others outside the rsc community, this is a waste of your time, unless you enjoy doing it.[/quote]

You talk like you’re sure of everything. You don’t have to play it if you think it’s a dumb idea, but please, in how many different ways can you say the same thing? If you don’t think it’s a good idea, get out of here.

Read full topic
item.source: SnoSaven Gaming Company - Upcoming RSC Server!

item.title: SnoSaven Gaming Company - Upcoming RSC Server!
item.dc:creator: @Dustin_Jr Dustin Jr
item.description:
@Dustin_Jr wrote:

[quote=“CodeForFame, post:118, topic:411633”][quote author=Dustin Jr link=topic=512888.msg4318038#msg4318038 date=1371799766]

The RSC map is already small, it’s just a pain to navigate because the only real quick transportation is teleporting, and even then you have to walk. Quests would open up different teleports, portals, and modes of transportation like boats, carriages, etc. It’s only big if you have to walk it.

I hope this is a joke lmao… The rsc is huge compared to the player base that plays. You do realize the Rsc servers had like 1k+ on them when it was open and even then it wasn’t crowded.

if your talking real rsc then your wrong. that shit was always crowded, I use to have to switch worlds to find good training/runes spots.

I’m talking real runescape, you didn’t have to change, but you thought you needed to, it was never crowded enough to not be able to train. I mean yeah instead of 50k an hour you only got 35-40, but that is hardly to crowded. That is like saying i only get 75 men instead of a 100 because there is another guy here.

There is no way this development will bring any more people in. You won’t reach any others outside the rsc community, this is a waste of your time, unless you enjoy doing it.

[/quote]You’d get nearly 0 xp/hour if someone else was there and they had a lower PID… I’m not sure what game you played, but you get about 1/2 if someone else was there and wasn’t botting, and you’d get about 1/3 if 2 other people were there.[/quote]

Who ever claimed i said i was afking? I’m talking about when you play the game, not sit in one spot waiting for npcs to attack you. Of course you won’t get any exp, just like you wouldn’t if i came to the same spot you were on rscemulation i could bring 5 accs to your spot and lower your exp…

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Snosaven24 Snosaven24
item.description:
@Snosaven24 wrote:

It’s huge compared to the current player base yes, but this game isn’t going to just serve the current player base. There’s a reason I’m changing everything and improving as much as I can. I want to appeal to as many different types of gaming communities as I can.
